name: Blank The Duck
description:
Type "start" and hit enter to call the duck.

They said it couldn't be done, but I've done it. I've taken the actual, real-life experience of encountering a duck and made it digital, for the Internet.

Type in any verb you can think of, and see what happens. There are 300 possible encounters, and more added all the time. How many can you find?

-------------- Not sure where to start?

Words are tough sometimes! Maybe try...

LOVE
PET
SLICE
FINISH
CELEBRATE
DARE
DESTROY
ATTRACT --------------

Music by Ryan Cullinane.

Duck sounds made by my mouth. UI SFX from FreeSound.org 

Everything else by me, Shawn Bowers.

Made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 with the theme "Less Is More." I applied the theme two ways: mechanic and aesthetic. For mechanic, the "less" of the only gameplay being typing a single word produces the "more" of 300+ possible responses. For aesthetic, keeping the UI as simple as possible and the duck abstracted with simple animations lets the text be king.
